description:
[SPDY] Add checks to track down invalid SpdyStreamRequest pointers

The crash dumps in the bug below point to a SpdyStreamRequest
pointer being invalid, although it's not obvious when
that happens. Hopefully these checks give further clues.

BUG=250841
R=rtenneti@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=211895

messages.text:
On 2013/07/17 01:15:49, ramant wrote:
> LGTM. (Will these checks be permanent?)

Not sure yet. I think it'll depend on what the root cause of the bug ends up being!

Committing soon.
Committed patchset #1 manually as r211895 (presubmit successful).

subject: [SPDY] Add checks to track down invalid SpdyStreamRequest pointers
